metadata.title: CVE-2022-46341 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in X.Org. This security flaw occurs because thehandler for the XIPassiveUngrab request accesses out-of-bounds memory wheninvoked with a high keycode or button code. This issue can lead to localprivileges elevation on systems where the X server is running privilegedand remote code execution for ssh X forwarding sessions.

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
